Term.Id: ADULTERY 1. The act of sexual unfaithfulness
ADULTERY 2. One who sexually violates marriage vows
ADULTERY 3. Those who are in any way unfaithful to God

ADVOCATE, COUNSELOR 3. Advisor

ALTAR 3. Altar in heaven (no longer a place of animal sacrifice)

ANGEL 1. A supernatural, spiritual being who is a messenger from God
ANGEL 2. A morally fallen supernatural, spiritual being who serves Satan
ANGEL 3. A human appointed to deliver a message or to do a particular task
